description: The HpeNetworkAdapterStatus resource describes additional properties for the NetworkAdapterCollection resource.

MemberContents.description: Provides the discovery status of this collection.  For some server platforms, only partial device discovery is possible under auxiliary power.

enumDescriptions.AllDevices: The server state allows complete device discovery.  All installed devices are listed as members.
enumDescriptions.AuxPowerDevices: The server architecture may not support power to all installed devices in the current auxiliary power state. Only devices capable of operating in this power state are listed as members.  Additional devices may be listed when the server is fully powered.

title: #HpeNetworkAdapterStatus.v1_0_0.HpeNetworkAdapterStatus
